doc.field: Sons of the American Revolution, Gen. William Floyd Chapter records
Sons of the American Revolution, Gen. William Floyd Chapter records
These records include memos, fliers, membership lists, and correspondence of the Gen. William Floyd Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolution, based in the New York City area.
These records include memos, fliers, membership lists, and correspondence of the Gen. William Floyd Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolution, based in the New York City area.

These records span the period 1959 to 1969. They include memos, fliers, membership lists, and correspondence of the Gen. William Floyd Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolution, based in the New York City area.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. The papers were formally accessioned in 1978.
